snippet.title: The Eternal Castle [REMASTERED] - Official Trailer (2019)
snippet.description:
[ AVAILABLE ON JAN 5, 2019 ]
Get it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/963450/The_Eternal_Castle_REMASTERED/
eShop USA: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/the-eternal-castle-remastered-switch/
eShop EUR: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/The-Eternal-Castle-REMASTERED--1810372.html

Twitter: https://twitter.com/eternalcastle87
Discord: https://discord.gg/MZXDZUR
Website: http://www.theeternalcastle.net/
Press Kit: http://www.theeternalcastle.net/press-kit.html
Soundtrack: https://kiiro.bandcamp.com/releases

The Eternal Castle [REMASTERED] is an ambitious attempt to modernize an old classic in order to keep its memory alive. Through detailed research and hard work, the production team tried to expand the experience while keeping the same 'feel' and emotional flow of the original masterpiece from 1987.

FEATURES
- Go through the adventure alone or with a friend in local co-op mode
- Play over 20 levels across 5 unique worlds
- Boss fights at the end of each world, plus 2 final Bosses
- Use up to 10 different weapons found in different worlds
- Unlock up to 10 different items to gain different abilities
- Find 30 missing fragments to get back home
- Repeat the dream for as many times as you can before officially dying
- Unlock extra episode "Lost Tales" and learn of a brave sacrifice.
- Unlock secret PvP Versus Mode in Dojo and Death Arena
